City Council
============

[Imagine Vinton 2035 Comprehensive Plan](https://vintontx.govoffice2.com/vertical/sites/%7B9571B011-F39E-4B6F-A49E-0B16AB6056A3%7D/uploads/2017_11_15_Vinton_TX_Combined_Report.pdf)


![Quintana](https://vintontx.govoffice2.com/vertical/Sites/%7B9571B011-F39E-4B6F-A49E-0B16AB6056A3%7D/uploads/Rachel_Quintana_Web.jpg)

Rachel Quintana, Mayor
----------------------

Mayor Quintana can be contacted through City Hall at (915) 886-5104 or by email at
[rquintana@vintontx.us](mailto:rquintana@vintontx.us)
.

![David Duran](https://vintontx.govoffice2.com/vertical/Sites/%7B9571B011-F39E-4B6F-A49E-0B16AB6056A3%7D/uploads/David_Duran_Web.jpg)

David Duran, Place 1
--------------------

**Term of Office 11/2025-11/2028**

Mr.
Duran has been a resident of Vinton since 2004 and was elected to Village
Council, Place 1, on November 4, 2025. A lifelong El Paso County resident, he
grew up on a small farm in the neighboring city of Socorro, Texas.

After
graduating from Ysleta High School, he attended the University of Texas at El
Paso, studying Business Administration and Criminal Justice. Mr. Duran went on
to build a successful career in sales while also pursuing several
small-business ventures. In 2003, he joined Canutillo Ace Hardware, where he
soon became General Manager and played a key role in fostering the company’s
growth until his retirement in January 2025.

He can be contacted through City Hall (915) 886-5104 or by email at
[dduran@vintontx.us](mailto:dduran@vintontx.us)
.

![Leticia Gonzalez](https://vintontx.govoffice2.com/vertical/Sites/%7B9571B011-F39E-4B6F-A49E-0B16AB6056A3%7D/uploads/Leticia_Gonzalez_Web.jpg)

Leticia Gonzalez, Place 2
-------------------------

**Term of Office 11/2025-11/2028**

She can be contacted through City Hall (915) 886-5104 or by email at
[lgonzalez@vintontx.us](mailto:lgonzalez@vintontx.us)
.

![Monrreal](https://vintontx.govoffice2.com/vertical/Sites/%7B9571B011-F39E-4B6F-A49E-0B16AB6056A3%7D/uploads/Monrreal_Web.jpg)

Paula Monrreal, Place 3
-----------------------

**Term of Office 11/2023-11/2026**

Ms. Monrreal was elected in November 2023 for her first term on City Council.

She can be contacted through City Hall at (915) 886-5104 or by email at
[pmonrreal@vintontx.us](mailto:pmonrreal@vintontx.us)
.

![Cloud](https://vintontx.govoffice2.com/vertical/Sites/%7B9571B011-F39E-4B6F-A49E-0B16AB6056A3%7D/uploads/Cloud_Web.jpg)

Lourdes "Lulu" Cloud, Place 4, Mayor Pro Tem
--------------------------------------------

**Term of Office 11/2023-11/2026**

Lourdes “Lulu” Cloud was re-elected to Place 4 of the Village of Vinton City Council in 2023. She was elected to her first term for Place 4 six years prior in November 2017.

Lourdes is currently employed with the El Paso Independent School District and has set many goals for herself. One being completing her degree from the University of Texas at El Paso, another to continue to serve her community, the Village of Vinton.

Serving others is one of Lourdes’ core values. She has dedicated much of her time to volunteering. Her volunteer activities include: River Cleanups, cleaning senior citizens yards, Bulk Waste events, Christmas in the Village, the Sterling Committee and Health Fairs.

Lourdes has lived in Vinton since 1993. Her greatest accomplishments in her life are her two sons, Edward Cloud Jr., a graduate from the University of Texas at El Paso, and Justin Cloud, a graduate from the University of Texas at San Antonio.

Lourdes looks forward to what the future holds for her with the Village of Vinton.

She can be contacted through City Hall at (915) 886-5104 or by email at
[lcloud@vintontx.us](mailto:lcloud@vintontx.us)
.

![Lucero](https://vintontx.govoffice2.com/vertical/Sites/%7B9571B011-F39E-4B6F-A49E-0B16AB6056A3%7D/uploads/Lucero_Web.jpg)

Santos Lucero, Place 5
----------------------

**Term of Office 11/2023-11/2026**

Mr. Lucero was re-elected in November 2023 for his fifth term on City Council.

He can be contacted through City Hall at (915) 886-5104 or by email at
[slucero@vintontx.us](mailto:slucero@vintontx.us)
.

Contact Information
-------------------

To contact the Mayor or any member of City Council:

Phone:

(915) 886-5104

436 E. Vinton Rd.
